snippet: Exactly what a “like” means played a part in a case in Virginia involving six people who say Sheriff B. J. Roberts of Hampton fired them for supporting an opponent in his 2009 re-election bid.
lead_paragraph: Exactly what a “like” means played a part in a case in Virginia involving six people who say Sheriff B. J. Roberts of Hampton fired them for supporting an opponent in his 2009 re-election bid.

headline.main: Clicking ‘Like’ on Facebook Is Not Protected Speech, Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: Clicking ‘Like’ on Facebook Is Not Protected Speech, Judge Rules
